title: Shurubumu Canyon
about: Shurubumu Canyon is located in Samegrelo, Chkhorotsku Municipality, near the village of Mukhuri, in the gorge of the river Khobistskali. It is one of the special places for wildlife and adventure lovers and attracts many travelers. Boxwood groves, moss-covered boulders and small waterfalls create a fabulous scene. The magical paths of the canyon lead to the Shurubumu Cave, which is distinguished by its beautiful gabled forms and greatly impresses the visitors. Shurubumu Canyon and Cave are some of the exotic places of Samegrelo. If you crave diversity and want to see something new and different, here you will definitely be able to travel to the mystical world and be filled with unforgettable emotions.
